core:description.text: A heavy-bottomed crystal tumbler containing two fingers of amber whisky. The faceted glass refracts the liquid into honeyed prisms. A single sphere of ice slowly melts within, and the rich aroma of oak, vanilla, and smoke fills the air.

containers-core:liquid_container.flavorText: The whisky coats the tongue with warmth, releasing notes of caramel, toasted oak, and a subtle smokiness. It finishes long and smooth, leaving a pleasant burn that radiates through the chest.
